H0.text: In which Netherlands city does the United Nations International Court of Justice sit. Amsterdam

H1.text: In which Netherlands city does the United Nations International Court of Justice sit. Utrecht

H2.text: In which Netherlands city does the United Nations International Court of Justice sit. Rotterdam

H3.text: In which Netherlands city does the United Nations International Court of Justice sit. Lahey

A4.text: The International Court of Justice, the main judicial arm of the United Nations, is based in The Hague.

A5.text: The ICJ is seated in the Peace Palace in The Hague, Netherlands.

A6.text: The ICJ is seated in the Peace Palace.

A7.text: It hosts intergovernmental organisations and international courts, many of which are in The Hague.
